markdown:
# repo-preflight internal release brief

## Internal highlights
- Sync package metadata version and add guard test
- Synced package metadata versioning by aligning pyproject.toml with runtime __version__.
- Added regression coverage to ensure project metadata and package version stay in lockstep.

## Why it matters internally
- This range includes mixed technical updates; review highlights for the main changes.
- Use this as a handoff summary for team context and planning.

## References
- Repo: https://github.com/alex-builds-source/repo-preflight
